----------------- 1.Description -----------------
Rejected some time ago as a defect Warrens experiment, the Fawn somehow found her way in your estate. She's completely oblivious to what happens around her, but at least she's not hostile.
She's a pure glass canon, centered around shuffling and momentum building for increasingly powerful attacks, at the cost of an incredibly fragile and deteriorating constitution.
